circumstances: The single engine airplane departed Kasaan in adverse weather conditions. After takeoff, it entered local fog when it struck tree tops and crashed on a hilly terrain. The pilot and a passenger were injured while five other occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot initiated flight in adverse weather conditions. The following contributing factors were reported:
- High obstructions, 
- Fog,
- Visibility 1/4 mile or less, 
- Entered local fog conditions shortly after takeoff.
